data.name: Devilian - Tempest Pack
data.detailed_description:
Unlock the Tempest class, as well as several items to help you get started in Nala.

Access to the Tempest class

Devastate your enemies as the terrifying Tempest

5-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

Inventory Expansion Ticket

Gain 8 additional Inventory slots

3-day Elara's Blessing

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

data.short_description: Unlock the Tempest class, as well as a several items to help you get started in Nala.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
